20101222015437.000|20101222015440.000|CC1|  games with my grandchildren.  
20101222015440.000|20101222015442.000|CC1|           Great news!          
20101222015442.000|20101222015442.000|CC1|      For people with COPD,     
20101222015442.000|20101222015445.000|CC1|  including chronic bronchitis, 
20101222015445.000|20101222015446.000|CC1|       emphysema, or both,      
20101222015446.000|20101222015446.000|CC1|   ADVAIR helps significantly   
20101222015446.000|20101222015449.000|CC1|     improve lung function.     
20101222015449.000|20101222015451.000|CC1| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101222015451.000|20101222015451.000|CC1|  ADVAIR is different from most 
20101222015451.000|20101222015453.000|CC1|     other COPD medications     
20101222015453.000|20101222015453.000|CC1|       because it contains      
20101222015453.000|20101222015456.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20101222015456.000|20101222015456.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20101222015456.000|20101222015458.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20101222015458.000|20101222015458.000|CC1|        working together        
20101222015458.000|20101222015500.000|CC1|   to help you breathe better.  
20101222015500.000|20101222015500.000|CC1|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101222015500.000|20101222015503.000|CC1|  inhalers for sudden symptoms  
20101222015503.000|20101222015503.000|CC1|        and should not be       
20101222015503.000|20101222015505.000|CC1|   used more than twice a day.  
20101222015505.000|20101222015507.000|CC1| People with COPD taking ADVAIR 
20101222015507.000|20101222015507.000|CC1|    may have a higher chance    
20101222015507.000|20101222015509.000|CC1|          of pneumonia.         
20101222015509.000|20101222015509.000|CC1|       ADVAIR may increase      
20101222015509.000|20101222015511.000|CC1|    your risk of osteoporosis   
20101222015511.000|20101222015513.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20101222015513.000|20101222015513.000|CC1|        Tell your doctor        
20101222015513.000|20101222015515.000|CC1|  if you have a heart condition 
20101222015515.000|20101222015515.000|CC1|     or high blood pressure     
20101222015515.000|20101222015517.000|CC1|      before taking ADVAIR.
